title: Fiancée by Christmas
description: Happily ever after starts at Happy Acres…or does it?Holiday checklist:	• Spend time with my family while staying at Happy Acres Orchard and recovering from life implosion #1.	• Getting my mojo back by working in the gift shop and our brand new venture, the CocoaBus.	• Resisting kisses from the handsome, mysterious, pain in the butt owner of the nearby Christmas tree farm. New holiday checklist (last one went off the rails):	• Having good old-fashioned fun with my family while serving our many customers at the busiest time of the year.	• Regaining my confidence in marketing and working with the public, what I do best.	• Lots and lots of steamy no-strings holiday hijinks with the deliciously annoying man I can’t keep my hands off…and it’s not just because he has the finest tree—ahem, trees—around. Final holiday checklist (you know the drill):	• Survive Christmas after life implosion #2 courtesy of the enigmatic man I couldn’t keep myself from falling for — or maybe, just maybe, find the way to save the holiday for both of us.Author’s note: Fiancée by Christmas is the first book in our Happy Acres contemporary romance series, which is set near Crescent Cove. This book has a happily-ever-after—assuming Rachel doesn’t kill Clay, which is always a possibility—and no cliffhanger.
author: Taryn Quinn
